DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare new method : combination conscious sedation remifentanil ( shortlasting opioid drug ) local anaesthesia , traditional general anaesthesia hysteroscopic surgery . The primary outcome : time spent operation room , time full mobilisation postoperatively time complete recovery postoperatively time discharge . Secondary outcome : patient satisfaction .
DOC.brief_title: Local Anaesthesia Remifentanil Sedation Versus Total Intravenous Anaesthesia Hysteroscopic Surgery Ambulatory Surgery Department .
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 year , ASA classification III Speaks write danish Signed inform consent ASA classification IIIVI Emotional disorder medically treat within week surgery Patients risk perioperative aspiration must intubate BMI > 35 Patients use pain medicine within week surgery ( except PCM NSAID ) Patients use sleep medicine sedative within week surgery
